text.text_translated: Earthquakes are when the ground shakes very hard. They can break many things, like buildings and bridges. But bridges do not fall down often. This is true for new bridges. Engineers now plan how to build bridges in a special way. They build them on ground that is very strong. This ground does not move easily during an earthquake.

best_attempt.text_translated: An earthquake is when the ground shakes a lot. Earthquakes can break many things, like bridges. But bridges do not fall down often. This is true for new bridges. Engineers are people who build bridges. They know how to build safe bridges in places with earthquakes. They build them on ground that is very strong. This ground does not move a lot.
